newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - S3 Inc forecast cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - S3 Inc forecast cut.

text.p: -- Hambrecht & Quist cut its 1997 earnings estimates for S3 Inc to $0.81 a share from $1.30 and its sales forecast to $535.2 million from $628.3 million.

-- The firm lowered its expectations after the company on Monday reported first-quarter earnings and said results in the second quarter would fall short of the previous three months because of seasonality and pricing pressure.

-- In a statement, Hambrecht said weak pricing for the company's graphics controllers and competition would cause the revenue in the June quarter to be down 13 percent and gross margins to decline sharply.
-- Hambrecht maintained a buy rating on the stock because of its low valuation and a solid outlook for the second half of 1997.
-- S3 shares were down 1-5/16 at 9-3/8 early Tuesday afternoon.
